text.section: An applicant for a child care special loan shall submit to the Department an application that contains the information that the Department requires.

The applicant for a child care special loan shall agree to:
operate the child care facility for at least the term of the child care special loan; and
repay the outstanding child care special loan in full on the loss of license, termination of lease, or transfer, sale, or refinancing of the child care facility, as applicable, before the end of the term of the child care special loan.
